thread.title: Creator of Basecamp Dock for Apple Products Launches IndieGoGo Campaign
thread.title_full: Creator of Basecamp Dock for Apple Products Launches IndieGoGo Campaign

author: prbuzz.com
title: Creator of Basecamp Dock for Apple Products Launches IndieGoGo Campaign
text:
Basecamp is a charging station for iOS products, including the Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad. It features an LED nightlight and hidden cable management that allows users to avoid tangles of wires and plugs, making it convenient to use anywhere. It also includes its own power source so that it does not need to be near a computer to be used. The unit charges three different iOS devices with a space-saving stand that features a sleek, attractive design. Now, the creators of Basecamp have launched an IndieGoGo campaign to raise funds to produce and distribute copies of this innovative product.
Pre-launch testing reactions have been extremely positive, with Apple fans offering strong support for the product. Comments from such trusted sources as Amazon include references to the convenience of Basecamp as well as the fact that it can manage all iOS products at once.
Currently, all of the design, 3-D printed prototypes, machine prototypes, moldings and toolings, as well as marketing and support materials, have been completed. The initial deposit for the first production run of 3,000 units has been made so manufacturing can begin. Funds raised by the IndieGoGo campaign will be used to pay for manufacturing, distribution and advertising.
As seen at http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/basecamp-dock-for-apple-watch-iphone-and-ipad , IndieGoGo campaign features pledge levels from $10 to $299, with perks including basic Basecamp units as well as those with a Bluetooth speaker. For more information on the individual awards associated with each pledge level, visit the IndieGoGo page.
About Basecamp:
Basecamp is a powerful 3-in-1 iOS charging dock that includes an LED nightlight and works with Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad products. With superior hidden cable management, it's own power source and optional Bluetooth capability, Basecamp is the easiest way to charge iOS products. Now, the creators have launched an IndieGoGo campaign to raise funds to produce and distribute this unique product.
